name: The 18th ACM SIGGRAPH International Conference on Virtual-Reality Continuum and its Applications in Industry (ACM SIGGRAPH VRCAI 2022)
content: Publication: All accepted papers and abstracts will be published in the ACM SIGGRAPH VRCAI 2022 Conference Proceedings and included in the ACM digital library (EI-indexed). Selected papers will be published in Computational Visual Media (Springer), Computer Animation and Virtual Worlds (Wiley), Virtual Reality & Intelligent Hardware (Elsevier), Visual Computing for Industry, Biomedicine, and Art (Springer).
